definition: abbr. for 台灣海峽|台湾海峡, Taiwan Strait
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Since its opening, Shantou-Taiwan direct sea freight route has maintained the momentum of rapid development.
sentences.chinese: 汕台海上货运直航开通以来，保持了快速发展势头。

sentences.english: The ancient Greeks knew it as the Scythian Sea, after the tribes who held its shores at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当古希腊部族占领海岸的时候，他们称它为斯基台海。

sentences.english: To maintain peace and stability of the Straits is in the interests of peoples on both sides of the Straits.
sentences.chinese: 维护台海地区和平与稳定，有利于两岸人民的利益。

definition: Diaoyu Islands, claimed by China but controlled by Japan as the Senkaku Islands, also called the Pinnacle Islands
Taiwan independence/(of Taiwan) to declare independence
Tsai Ing-wen (1956-), Taiwanese DPP politician, president of the Republic of China from 2016
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
military aircraft/secret plan/Privy Council during the Qing dynasty
to unify by using military force (usu. in relation to Taiwan)
the China Seas (the seas of the Western Pacific Ocean, around China: Bohai Sea, Yellow Sea, East China Sea, South China Sea)
